import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Button, Form, FormField } from "semantic-ui-react"; import axios from "axios"; const PersonalDetails = () => { const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); const [editingIName, setEditingItem] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { // Fetch the list of items when the component mounts axios .get(`https://651d753144e393af2d59d664.mockapi.io/users/${1}`) .then((response) => setUsers(response.data)) .catch((error) => console.error(error)); }, []); return ( <>

setAdditionalFile(e.target.files[0])} className="CustomFileInput" // Add your custom CSS class here />

setNewComment(e.target.value)} />
); }; export default PersonalDetails;
